select queue_id from console_engine_tenant where is_deleted = 0 and tenant_id = #{tenantId} and queue_id is not NULL

select t.dt_uic_tenant_id as tenant_id,t.tenant_name,et.queue_id from console_engine_tenant et left join console_dtuic_tenant t on et.tenant_id = t.id where et.engine_id = #{engineId} and et.is_deleted = 0

SELECT et.id,et.tenant_id,et.engine_id,et.queue_id,et.gmt_create,et.gmt_modified,et.is_deleted FROM console_engine_tenant et LEFT JOIN console_engine e ON e.id = et.engine_id LEFT JOIN console_dtuic_tenant dt ON dt.id = et.tenant_id WHERE dt.dt_uic_tenant_id = #{dtuicTenantId} AND e.engine_type = #{engineType} LIMIT 1

SELECT ce.cluster_id FROM console_engine ce LEFT JOIN console_engine_tenant cet ON cet.engine_id = ce.id LEFT JOIN console_dtuic_tenant cdt on cdt.id = cet.tenant_id WHERE cdt.dt_uic_tenant_id= #{dtuicTenantId} LIMIT 1
